data.text: @okpedrodelgado @NHSBartsHealth @WeImproveBH @A_WilliamsNHS @JenLeonard6 @chrisjgordon1 Thank you for taking the time to hear about what we’ve been up to!

@JenLeonard6 @okpedrodelgado @NHSBartsHealth @WeImproveBH @A_WilliamsNHS @chrisjgordon1 @sarahjbreese1 @louisechicks1 @AnnieHunn @_evafiz @hannahevans33 @Collette_mcq @vivmonk @_HelenWensley @Abbasmirza70 @annamoore83 Good to be having these conversations

@okpedrodelgado @NHSBartsHealth @WeImproveBH @A_WilliamsNHS @chrisjgordon1 @sarahjbreese1 @louisechicks1 @AnnieHunn @_evafiz @hannahevans33 @Collette_mcq @vivmonk @_HelenWensley @Abbasmirza70 And thank you to @henna_rob and @annamoore83 for such inspiration on the opportunity weimprove provides to supporting the sustainability agenda- looking forward to the next chapter!

@okpedrodelgado @NHSBartsHealth @WeImproveBH @A_WilliamsNHS @chrisjgordon1 Fantastic hearing from everyone today - a huge thank you to colleagues for sharing the stories and journey so far…looking forward to day 2 👏🏻👏🏻 @WeImproveBH @sarahjbreese1 @louisechicks1 @AnnieHunn @_evafiz @hannahevans33 @Collette_mcq @vivmonk @_HelenWensley @Abbasmirza70
@okpedrodelgado @NHSBartsHealth @WeImproveBH @A_WilliamsNHS @JenLeonard6 @chrisjgordon1 So nice meeting you all. Thank you for listening and for your guidance today 💛
